porous.name: Porous
porous.shortDesc: Absorbs self-KO moves and Water-type moves, and restores 1/4 max HP.

despicable.name: Despicable
despicable.shortDesc: This Pokemon's attacks are critical hits if the target is burned or poisoned.

kingsguard.name: King's Guard
kingsguard.shortDesc: Protected from enemy priority moves and Attack reduction.

growthveil.name: Growth Veil
growthveil.shortDesc: Restores 1/3 max HP on switch-out; ally Grass-types safe from enemy stat drops & status.
growthveil.desc: Restores 1/3 max HP on switch-out; ally Grass-types can't have stats lowered or status inflicted.

surgeoneye.name: Surgeon Eye
surgeoneye.shortDesc: Restores 1/3 max HP on switch-out. Attack power 1.3x if it moves last in a turn.

roughresult.name: Rough Result
roughresult.shortDesc: Foes making contact lose 1/8 max HP; if KOed by contact, attacker loses 1/4 max HP.
roughresult.desc: Pokemon making contact lose 1/8 max HP; if KOed by a contact move, attacker loses 1/4 max HP.

eyeforaneye.name: Eye for an Eye
eyeforaneye.shortDesc: This Pokemon blocks Dark-type moves and bounces them back to the user.

naturalheal.name: Natural Heal
naturalheal.shortDesc: Restores 1/3 max HP and cures non-volatile status on switch-out.

kingofpowerpoints.name: King of Power Points
kingofpowerpoints.shortDesc: Moves targeting it: -1 extra PP. Restores 1/3 max PP of its moves on switch-out.
kingofpowerpoints.desc: Moves targeting this Pokemon lose 1 additional PP. Restores 1/3 max PP of its moves on switch-out, rounded down.

porousfat.name: Porous Fat
porousfat.shortDesc: Fire/Ice/Water moves against this Pokemon deal damage with a halved attacking stat.

nullsystem.name: Null System
nullsystem.shortDesc: This Pokemon can be any type (selected in teambuilder).

inthicktrator.name: Inthicktrator
inthicktrator.shortDesc: Ignores Screens/Substitutes. Fire/Ice moves: 1/2 power against this Pokemon.

magicsurge.name: Magic Surge
magicsurge.shortDesc: Summons Magic Room for 5 turns when switching in.

multiantlers.name: Multi Antlers
multiantlers.shortDesc: User takes half damage when switching in.

concussion.name: Concussion
concussion.shortDesc: Halves the effects of stat changes when taking or dealing damage.

fowlbehavior.name: Fowl Behavior
fowlbehavior.shortDesc: This Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x, but it can only select the first move it executes.

pillage.name: Pillage
pillage.shortDesc: On switch-in, swaps ability with the opponent.

magneticwaves.name: Magnetic Waves
magneticwaves.shortDesc: Normal moves: Electric type, 1.2x power. Immune to Ground moves.

doggysmaw.name: Doggy's Maw
doggysmaw.shortDesc: This Pokemon's Normal, Fighting and Dragon moves ignore type-based immunities.

sturdymold.name: Sturdy Mold
sturdymold.shortDesc: One-hit KOs leave it with 1 HP. Ignores attacker's ability when taking damage.

therapeutic.name: Therapeutic
therapeutic.shortDesc: Heals 1/8 max HP each turn when statused. Ignores non-Sleep effects of status.

solarpanel.name: Solar Panel
solarpanel.shortDesc: If hit by Grass, Electric or Fire: +1 SpA. Grass/Electric/Fire immunity.

bigpressure.name: Big Pressure
bigpressure.shortDesc: Moves targeting this Pokemon lose 1 additional PP; Foes cannot lower its Defense.

friendshield.name: Friend Shield
friendshield.shortDesc: Gets +1 Defense on switch-in. Allies recieve 3/4 damage from foes' attacks.

debilitate.name: Debilitate
debilitate.shortDesc: On switch-in, this Pokemon lowers the Special Attack of adjacent opponents by 1 stage.

leafyarmor.name: Leafy Armor
leafyarmor.shortDesc: If a mental status is inflicted on this Pokemon: Cure status, -1 Defense, +2 Speed.

surroundsound.name: Surround Sound
surroundsound.shortDesc: This Pokemon recieves 1/2 damage from multitarget moves. Its own have 1.3x power.

spikyhold.name: Spiky Hold
spikyhold.shortDesc: Cannot lose held item due to others' attacks; others making contact lose 1/8 max HP.

sinkorswim.name: Sink or Swim
sinkorswim.shortDesc: On switch-in, lowers adjacent opponents' Speed by 1 stage.

downpour.name: Downpour
downpour.shortDesc: If targeted by a foe's move: move loses 1 extra PP, this Pokemon restores 1/16 max HP.

overclock.name: Overclock
overclock.shortDesc: If stats are lowered by foe or if hit by Electric move: Atk +2.

magicmissile.name: Magic Missile
magicmissile.shortDesc: If hit by a contact move while holding an item: lose item, apply item Fling effects, attacker loses 1/4 max HP. If hitting a foe with a contact move while not holding an item: steals the foe's item.
